channel.title: candor on Paul Hübner
channel.description: Recent content in candor on Paul Hübner

item.title: Candor: A Simple and Powerful CI Ecosystem
item.description: Candor is a CI ecosystem - a dashboard with runners - that not only caters to my needs but is also a manifestation of what happens when I let my passion and perfectionism get the better of me. Behind it is a multi-year process, months of active development, fuelled by caffeine and sheer commitment. If you would like to check it out, you can view the project on GitHub.
